Sentencas: The recycling of waste material has been considered an attractive source for energy production.
Titulo: Recycling of lead from lead acid battery to form composite material as an anode for low temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: It is much better to reuse waste batteries than dumping them into landfills.
Titulo: Recycling of lead from lead acid battery to form composite material as an anode for low temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Some advantages that recycling offers include the reduction of pollution load and conservation of natural resources.
Titulo: Recycling of lead from lead acid battery to form composite material as an anode for low temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In the current studies, waste lead acid batteries were used for the production of composite materials i.e.,Pb0.1Cu0.4Zn0.5O3-delta, Pb0.2Cu0.3Zn0.5O3-delta and Pb0.3Cu0.2Zn0.5O3-delta.
Titulo: Recycling of lead from lead acid battery to form composite material as an anode for low temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Recycling of lead acid battery was a difficult job to develop the cost-effective anode material for low temperature solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Recycling of lead from lead acid battery to form composite material as an anode for low temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The structural and morphological properties were examined by XRD and SEM.
Titulo: Recycling of lead from lead acid battery to form composite material as an anode for low temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Thermal stability was analyzed by TGA.
Titulo: Recycling of lead from lead acid battery to form composite material as an anode for low temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The nature of metal oxide bonding in ceramic composites was investigated by FTIR spectra.
Titulo: Recycling of lead from lead acid battery to form composite material as an anode for low temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Electrochemical investigations were carried out using DC four probes and fuel cell testing unit.
Titulo: Recycling of lead from lead acid battery to form composite material as an anode for low temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Average crystalline size was found to be in the range 45-69 nm.
Titulo: Recycling of lead from lead acid battery to form composite material as an anode for low temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: SEM images show the porosity of material which is favorable for the diffusion of gases.
Titulo: Recycling of lead from lead acid battery to form composite material as an anode for low temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Maximum conductivities 5.1S/cm, 4.2S/cm and 2.54S/cm have been achieved for Pb0.3Cu0.2Zn0.5O3-delta, Pb0.2Cu0.3Zn0.5O3-delta and Pb0.1Cu0.4Zn0.5O3-delta, respectively.
Titulo: Recycling of lead from lead acid battery to form composite material as an anode for low temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Maximum power density (755 mW/cm(2)) and high OCV 1.06 V has been obtained using hydrogen as a fuel at 600 degrees C. Lower activation energy (0.35ev) confirms that Pb0.3Cu0.2Zn0.5O3-delta is the best candidate for electrochemical conversion of hydrogen fuel into useful electricity.
Titulo: Recycling of lead from lead acid battery to form composite material as an anode for low temperature solid oxide fuel cell
